imagePullSecrets.description: Global Docker registry secret names as an array

name.description: Elasticsearch service name to be used in the Kibana subchart (ignored if kibanaEnabled=false)

restAPI.description: Elasticsearch service restAPI port to be used in the Kibana subchart (ignored if kibanaEnabled=false)

kibanaEnabled.description: Whether or not to enable Kibana

commonLabels.description: Labels to add to all deployed objects

commonAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to all deployed objects

extraDeploy.description: Array of extra objects to deploy with the release

enabled.description: Enable diagnostic mode (all probes will be disabled and the command will be overridden)

command.description: Command to override all containers in the deployment

args.description: Args to override all containers in the deployment

plugins.description: Comma, semi-colon or space separated list of plugins to install at initialization

extraConfig.description: Append extra configuration to the elasticsearch node configuration

extraHosts.description: A list of external hosts which are part of this cluster

extraVolumes.description: A list of volumes to be added to the pod

extraVolumeMounts.description: A list of volume mounts to be added to the pod

initScripts.description: Dictionary of init scripts. Evaluated as a template.

initScriptsCM.description: ConfigMap with the init scripts. Evaluated as a template.

initScriptsSecret.description: Secret containing `/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d` scripts to be executed at initialization time that contain sensitive data. Evaluated as a template.

extraEnvVars.description: Array containing extra env vars to be added to all pods (evaluated as a template)

extraEnvVarsCM.description: ConfigMap containing extra env vars to be added to all pods (evaluated as a template)

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Secret containing extra env vars to be added to all pods (evaluated as a template)

sidecars.description: Add additional sidecar containers to the all elasticsearch node pod(s)

initContainers.description: Add additional init containers to the all elasticsearch node pod(s)

useIstioLabels.description: Use this variable to add Istio labels to all pods

tag.description: Elasticsearch image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: Elasticsearch image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

existingSecret.description: Name of the existing secret containing the Elasticsearch password and

fipsMode.description: Configure elasticsearch with FIPS 140 compliant mode

restEncryption.description: Enable SSL/TLS encryption for Elasticsearch REST API.

existingSecret.description: Existing secret containing the certificates for the master nodes
Existing secret containing the certificates for the data nodes
Existing secret containing the certificates for the ingest nodes
Existing secret containing the certificates for the coordinating nodes

usePemCerts.description: Use this variable if your secrets contain PEM certificates instead of JKS/PKCS12

passwordsSecret.description: Existing secret containing the Keystore and Truststore passwords, or key password if PEM certs are used

keystorePassword.description: Password to access the JKS/PKCS12 keystore or PEM key when they are password-protected.

truststorePassword.description: Password to access the JKS/PKCS12 truststore when they are password-protected.

keyPassword.description: Password to access the PEM key when they are password-protected.

secretKeystoreKey.description: Name of the secret key containing the Keystore password

secretTruststoreKey.description: Name of the secret key containing the Truststore password

secretKey.description: Name of the secret key containing the PEM key password

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for Elasticsearch service

extraPorts.description: Extra ports to expose in Elasticsearch service (normally used with the `sidecars` value)

sessionAffinity.description: Session Affinity for Kubernetes service, can be "None" or "ClientIP"

enabled.description: Enable ingress record generation for Elasticsearch

apiVersion.description: Force Ingress API version (automatically detected if not set)

hostname.description: Default host for the ingress record

path.description: Default path for the ingress record

annotations.description: Additional annotations for the Ingress resource. To enable certificate autogeneration, place here your cert-manager annotations.

tls.description: Enable TLS configuration for the host defined at `ingress.hostname` parameter

selfSigned.description: Create a TLS secret for this ingress record using self-signed certificates generated by Helm

ingressClassName.description: IngressClass that will be be used to implement the Ingress (Kubernetes 1.18+)

extraHosts.description: An array with additional hostname(s) to be covered with the ingress record

extraPaths.description: An array with additional arbitrary paths that may need to be added to the ingress under the main host

extraTls.description: TLS configuration for additional hostname(s) to be covered with this ingress record

extraRules.description: Additional rules to be covered with this ingress record

masterOnly.description: Deploy the Elasticsearch master-elegible nodes as master-only nodes. Recommended for high-demand deployments.

replicaCount.description: Number of master-elegible replicas to deploy

extraRoles.description: Append extra roles to the node role

create.description: Enable/disable a Pod Disruption Budget creation

minAvailable.description: Minimum number/percentage of pods that should remain scheduled

maxUnavailable.description: Maximum number/percentage of pods that may be made unavailable

limits.description: The resources limits for elasticsearch containers

requests.description: The requested resources for elasticsearch containers

fsGroup.description: Set master-elegible pod's Security Context fsGroup

runAsUser.description: Set master-elegible containers' Security Context runAsUser

runAsNonRoot.description: Set master-elegible containers' Security Context runAsNonRoot

podAffinityPreset.description: Pod affinity preset. Ignored if `master.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: Pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `master.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

type.description: Node affinity preset type. Ignored if `master.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: Node label key to match. Ignored if `master.affinity` is set

values.description: Node label values to match. Ignored if `master.affinity` is set

nodeSelector.description: Node labels for master-elegible pods assignment

schedulerName.description: Name of the k8s scheduler (other than default) for master-elegible pods

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: In seconds, time the given to the Elasticsearch Master pod needs to terminate gracefully

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology Spread Constraints for pod assignment spread across your cluster among failure-domains. Evaluated as a template

podManagementPolicy.description: podManagementPolicy to manage scaling operation of Elasticsearch master pods

enabled.description: Enable/disable the startup probe (master nodes pod)

initialDelaySeconds.description: Delay before startup probe is initiated (master nodes pod)

periodSeconds.description: How often to perform the probe (master nodes pod)

timeoutSeconds.description: When the probe times out (master nodes pod)

successThreshold.description: Minimum consecutive successes for the probe to be considered successful after having failed (master nodes pod)

failureThreshold.description: Minimum consecutive failures for the probe to be considered failed after having succeeded

enabled.description: Enable/disable the liveness probe (master-eligible nodes pod)

initialDelaySeconds.description: Delay before liveness probe is initiated (master-eligible nodes pod)

periodSeconds.description: How often to perform the probe (master-eligible nodes pod)

timeoutSeconds.description: When the probe times out (master-eligible nodes pod)

successThreshold.description: Minimum consecutive successes for the probe to be considered successful after having failed (master-eligible nodes pod)

failureThreshold.description: Minimum consecutive failures for the probe to be considered failed after having succeeded

enabled.description: Enable/disable the readiness probe (master-eligible nodes pod)

initialDelaySeconds.description: Delay before readiness probe is initiated (master-eligible nodes pod)

periodSeconds.description: How often to perform the probe (master-eligible nodes pod)

timeoutSeconds.description: When the probe times out (master-eligible nodes pod)

successThreshold.description: Minimum consecutive successes for the probe to be considered successful after having failed (master-eligible nodes pod)

failureThreshold.description: Minimum consecutive failures for the probe to be considered failed after having succeeded

command.description: Override default container command (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args (useful when using custom images)

lifecycleHooks.description: for the master-elegible container(s) to automate configuration before or after startup

extraEnvVars.description: Array with extra environment variables to add to master-elegible nodes

extraEnvVarsCM.description: Name of existing ConfigMap containing extra env vars for master-elegible nodes

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Name of existing Secret containing extra env vars for master-elegible nodes

extraVolumes.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumes for the master-elegible pod(s)

extraVolumeMounts.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumeMounts for the master-elegible container(s)

sidecars.description: Add additional sidecar containers to the master-elegible pod(s)

initContainers.description: Add additional init containers to the master-elegible pod(s)

existingVolume.description: Existing Persistent Volume for use as volume match label selector to the `volumeClaimTemplate`. Ignored when `master.persistence.selector` is set.

selector.description: Configure custom selector for existing Persistent Volume. Overwrites `master.persistence.existingVolume`

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created

name.description: Name of the service account to use. If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the fullname template.

automountServiceAccountToken.description: Automount service account token for the server service account

annotations.description: Annotations for service account. Evaluated as a template. Only used if `create` is `true`.

maxReplicas.description: Configure a maximum amount of pods

targetCPU.description: Define the CPU target to trigger the scaling actions (utilization percentage)

targetMemory.description: Define the memory target to trigger the scaling actions (utilization percentage)

replicaCount.description: Number of data-only replicas to deploy
